hero.title: Unleash the Value
hero.subtitle: Software Consultancy
hero.description: We redefine software planning and execution, delivering exceptional value to North American companies. Slash costs by 65% without compromising quality. Boost productivity by 35% with our strategic approach. Explore our case study on "Nearshoring: VSol and Your Path to Results in 3 Simple Steps." Inquire now for details!

services.title: We Are VSol
services.subtitle: Microsoft and Open Source Technologies
services.mainDescription: We work with Microsoft .NET and modern open source platforms to create architectures that support the growth of our clients' systems

items.title: Staff Augmentation
items.description: Our consulting team in Brazil is made up of professionals fluent in English with expertise across Microsoft and open source technologies. We supplement existing software teams or operate as the sole team for companies looking to reduce their costs and receive an excellent return on their investment

items.title: Agentic AI
items.description: We combine advanced AI agents with expert human guidance to deliver software faster, smarter, and more efficiently. AI handles repetitive coding tasks, automated testing, and documentation while experienced developers guide architecture, strategy, and critical decisions. Achieve 3-5x faster delivery and up to 70% cost reduction without compromising quality.

items.title: The VSol Difference
items.description: Our clients develop software for large enterprises and global institutions. Our service has a strong impact in many industries and its results affect thousands of people in different parts of the world. We are expanding quickly and we are always looking for the best professionals to work with us. See the Careers section below for more information

items.title: Our Methodology
items.description: We are PMI PMP certified, Certified Scrum Masters, and Scrum with Kanban certified from Scrum.org. Our team relies on Agile methodologies to drive our projects forward. We're committed to delivering results that align with our customers' expectations, all while staying within the specified time frame and budget

careers.title: Work at VSol Software
careers.subtitle: We are looking for the best in our field.

positions.title: Node.js Software Developer
positions.description: We're seeking talented Node.js developers to build scalable, high-performance backend systems and APIs. Work with cutting-edge technologies including TypeScript, modern frameworks, and cloud platforms. This is a fully remote position for self-motivated professionals who thrive in a collaborative, agile environment.
needed: Proficiency in English to read and write technical documents, chats, emails and requirements
Strong experience with Node.js and TypeScript
Database design and optimization (PostgreSQL, SQL Server, or MongoDB)
Understanding of asynchronous programming and event-driven architecture
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or similar experience
desirable: Experience with Express.js, Fastify, or NestJS
positions.bigPlus: Experience with Scrum/Agile methodologies, CI/CD pipelines, and real-time applications (WebSockets, Server-Sent Events)

positions.title: Fullstack Software Developer
positions.description: We're hiring modern fullstack developers who are passionate about building elegant, performant web applications. Work with the latest technologies including TypeScript, React/Angular, Node.js, and cloud platforms. This fully remote position offers competitive compensation based on your experience level. If you're self-organized, love clean code, and want to work with cutting-edge tech, you'll thrive here.
needed: Proficiency in English to read and write technical documents, chats, emails and requirements
Strong web development fundamentals (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript/TypeScript)
Experience with modern frontend frameworks (React, Angular, or Vue)
Backend development with Node.js or ASP.NET Core
Knowledge and ability to apply design patterns and best practices
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or similar experience
desirable: Experience with React or Angular and TypeScript
Backend experience with Node.js, Express, or ASP.NET Core
Database design with PostgreSQL, SQL Server, or MongoDB
State management libraries (Redux, Zustand, or NgRx)
Modern CSS frameworks (Tailwind CSS, Material UI, or Bootstrap)
positions.bigPlus: Experience with Scrum/Agile, cloud services (Azure, AWS, Render), Docker, CI/CD pipelines, and automated testing (Jest, Vitest, Playwright)

items.title: The Developers Conference
items.description: With teams distributed throughout Brazil, we attend events together in Florianopolis, Sao Paulo, and beyond.

items.title: Coworking
items.description: We take advantage of our periodical coworking events to catch up and share crucial knowledge about our work.

items.title: Christmas Party
items.description: For, more than just a day, Christmas is a state of mind. It is found throughout the year whenever faith overcomes doubt, hope conquers despair, and love triumphs over hate. It is present when men of any creed bring love and understanding to the hearts of their fellow man. We had a great time with family and friends, enjoying secret santa and good food.

items.title: Paintball
items.description: Paintball is a game developed in the 1980s in which players eliminate opponents from play by hitting them with dye-filled, breakable, oil and gelatin paintballs, or pellets, usually shot from a carbon dioxide or compressed air (Nitrogen) powered paintball marker. We had fun with family and friends at this exciting event.

contact.title: Headquarters
contact.subtitle: Virtually Collocated Offices
contact.location: VSol is based in Coral Springs, Florida with an additional presence in Spring Lake, FL off of I-75 South. We are virtually collocated, which means we work from the comfort of our home offices employing the best collaboration tools to work smarter
contact.address: 3111 N University Dr. Ste 105 - Coral Springs, FL 33065
contact.additionalLocation: Spring Lake, FL - off I-75 South
